General.Name: Sichuan Yimikang Environmental Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Yimikang Tech.Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision air conditioning solutions in China. The company provides precision air conditioners, micro-modules, UPS power supplies, cold aisles, magnetic levitation chillers, and other equipment for cloud data centers, communication/information equipment rooms, edge data centers, and base stations; and various cloud-side data center infrastructure design, layout, integration, prefabrication, general contracting, and other services. It also offers data center dynamic environment monitoring systems, energy management systems, DCIM systems and other software, intelligent inspection robots, and intelligent parks; and data center smart operation and maintenance, smart township, and various energy-saving renovation combined solutions and services. In addition, the company offers dust removal, desulfurization, and denitrification equipment for environment protection. It serves the Internet, government, operators, finance, energy, military, electric power, public security, transportation, medical care, education, people's livelihood, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Sichuan Yimikang Environmental Tech. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Yimikang Tech.Group Co., Ltd. in February 2018. Yimikang Tech.Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Chengdu, China.
General.Address: No. 2, Keyuan South 2nd Road, Chengdu, China, 610041
